Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptide KSL-W and analogues: Promising agents to control plant diseases.
Literature.Author: Camó C, Bonaterra A, Badosa E, Baró A, Montesinos L, Montesinos E, Planas M, Feliu L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Erwinia amylovora PMV 6076(MIC=12.5-25µM),Pseudomonas syringae pv. syringae EPS 94(MIC=25-50µM),Xanthomonas campestris pv. Vesicatoria 2133-2(MIC=3.1-6.2µM),Pseudomonas syringae pv. actinidiae Psa3700.1.1(MIC=12.5-25µM),Xanthomonas fragariae Xf349-9A(MIC=6.2-12.5µM),Xanthomonas arboricola pv. pruni CFBP 5563(MIC=12.5-25µM)
